member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader.CreateFontFileReferenceFromUrl

summary.para: Creates a font file reference from a URL if the loader supports this capability.

param.name: factory
param.para: Factory used to create the font file reference.

param.name: baseUrl
param.para: Optional base URL. The base URL is used to resolve the fontFileUrl if it is relative. For example, the baseUrl might be the URL of the referring document that contained the fontFileUrl.

param.name: fontFile
param.para: Receives a pointer to the newly created font file reference.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

remarks.para: If baseUrl is a non-empty string, then baseUrl concatenated with fontFileUrl should form a valid URL, DirectWrite will not supply any additional delimiter.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileLoader

summary.para: Represents a font file loader that can access remote (i.e., downloadable) fonts. The method returns an instance of this interface, which the client can use to load remote fonts without having to implement a custom loader. A client can also create its own custom implementation, however. In either case, the client is responsible for registering and unregistering the loader using IDWriteFactory.
